name: js-angusj-clipper
description: Polygon and line clipping and offsetting library for Javascript / Typescript - a port of Angus Johnson's clipper to WebAssembly / Asm.JS

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build: npm run build:universal && npm run build:web && shx mkdir -p dist && shx mv dist-universal dist/universal/ && shx mv dist-web dist/web/
scripts.build:universal: npm run build:ts && npm run build:asm && shx mv dist dist-universal
scripts.build:web: npm run build:ts && npm run build:asm -- --env web && shx mv dist dist-web

author: Javier Gonzalez Garces <xaviergonz@gmail.com>
